<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>buffer</myVariableName> <myType>double</myType> <myLabel>Buffer Distance</myLabel> <myToolTip>Distance that route should maintain away from obstacles.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>5</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>1000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
